name: Robot Wipeout - Early Access
description:
Robot Wipeout is a 3rd person beat-em-up game(show) where you fight against hordes of nasty bots and dodge deadly hazards, all for the entertainment of the gullible public. Smack your way up to the top, where the Not-So-Big Boss is waiting for you to give it a beating!

Fight through a variety of challenging stages and become the ultimate Wipeout champion!

...at least until the next instalment of the show.

Controller:

QWERTY Keyboard:
